tooSmall.array: Array must contain at least {{minimum}} item(s)

tooBig.string: String must contain at most {{maximum}} character(s)
tooBig.number: Number must be less than or equal to {{maximum}}
tooBig.array: Array must contain at most {{maximum}} item(s)

HomePage.title: Home page
HomePage.description: Craving a classic American diner experience? Look no further than Big Boy! Savor our iconic Big Boy burger, juicy and flavorful, paired with creamy milkshakes and crispy fries. Perfect for families and friends!

Common.checkBackLater: Please check back later for our delicious offerings

About.title: About Our Restaurant
About.description: Discover our story, passion, and commitment to culinary excellence
About.ourStoryIntro: Founded with a passion for authentic flavors and exceptional dining experiences, our restaurant has been serving the community for over a decade. What started as a small family-owned establishment has grown into a beloved local favorite.
About.ourStoryMission: Our journey began with a simple mission: to bring people together through delicious food, warm hospitality, and memorable experiences. Every dish we serve tells a story of tradition, innovation, and dedication to quality.
About.ourPhilosophyIntro: We believe that great food is more than just ingredientsâ€”it's about passion, craftsmanship, and respect for tradition. Our chefs combine time-honored techniques with modern innovation to create dishes that delight the senses.
About.ourPhilosophySustainability: Sustainability and community are at the heart of everything we do. We source locally whenever possible, support regional farmers and producers, and strive to minimize our environmental impact.
About.chefDescription: With over 20 years of experience, our executive chef brings creativity and expertise to every dish.
About.managerDescription: Ensuring every guest has an exceptional experience is our manager's top priority.
About.pastryChefDescription: Our pastry chef transforms simple ingredients into extraordinary desserts.
About.qualityIngredientsDesc: We source the finest ingredients from trusted suppliers and local farms. Our commitment to quality means we never compromise on freshness or flavor.
About.exceptionalServiceDesc: Our staff is trained to provide attentive, personalized service that makes every guest feel welcome and valued.
About.communityEngagementDesc: We actively participate in local events and support community initiatives, believing that a strong restaurant is part of a strong community.
About.continuousInnovationDesc: While honoring traditional recipes, we constantly explore new flavors and techniques to keep our menu exciting and fresh.
About.visitUsDescription: Experience the perfect blend of tradition and innovation. Join us for an unforgettable culinary journey that celebrates the best of local flavors and international cuisine.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introductionDesc: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.
PrivacyPolicy.infoWeCollectDesc: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together as follows:
PrivacyPolicy.identityData: Identity Data including first name, last name, username or similar identifier
PrivacyPolicy.contactData: Contact Data including billing address, delivery address, email address and telephone numbers
PrivacyPolicy.financialData: Financial Data including bank account and payment card details
PrivacyPolicy.transactionData: Transaction Data including details about payments to and from you and other details of products and services you have purchased from us
PrivacyPolicy.technicalData: Technical Data including internet protocol (IP) address, your login data, browser type and version, time zone setting and location, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform and other technology on the devices you use to access this website
PrivacyPolicy.profileData: Profile Data including your username and password, purchases or orders made by you, your interests, preferences, feedback and survey responses
PrivacyPolicy.usageData: Usage Data including information about how you use our website, products and services
PrivacyPolicy.marketingData: Marketing and Communications Data including your preferences in receiving marketing from us and our third parties and your communication preferences
PrivacyPolicy.howWeUseDesc: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
PrivacyPolicy.contractUse: Where we need to perform the contract we are about to enter into or have entered into with you
PrivacyPolicy.legalUse: Where we need to comply with a legal or regulatory obligation
PrivacyPolicy.legitimateUse: Where it is necessary for our legitimate interests (or those of a third party) and your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests
PrivacyPolicy.consentUse: Where we have your consent to do so
PrivacyPolicy.cookiesDesc: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and store certain information. Cookies are files with small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier.
PrivacyPolicy.dataSecurityDesc: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered or disclosed.
PrivacyPolicy.dataRetentionDesc: We will only retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfil the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
PrivacyPolicy.legalRightsDesc: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to request access, correction, erasure, restriction, transfer, or to object to processing.
PrivacyPolicy.contactDesc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.introductionDesc: Welcome to our restaurant services. These terms of service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our website, mobile applications, and related services (collectively, the "Services").
TermsOfService.introductionAgreement: By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you must not use our Services.
TermsOfService.useOfServicesDesc: You agree to use our Services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:
TermsOfService.useOfServicesViolate: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
TermsOfService.useOfServicesInfringe: Infringe upon the rights of others
TermsOfService.useOfServicesHarmful: Transmit any material that is harmful, offensive, or otherwise objectionable
TermsOfService.useOfServicesUnauthorized: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or networks
TermsOfService.useOfServicesInterfere: Interfere with the proper functioning of our Services
TermsOfService.accountsDesc: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer or device.
TermsOfService.ordersAndPaymentsDesc: By placing an order through our Services, you are making an offer to purchase the selected items. All orders are subject to acceptance by us, and we reserve the right to refuse any order for any reason.
TermsOfService.ordersAndPaymentsCharges: You agree to pay all charges incurred by your account, including applicable taxes. We may automatically charge your selected payment method for orders placed through our Services.
TermsOfService.intellectualPropertyDesc: All content included in or made available through our Services, such as text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the property of our restaurant or its licensors and protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
TermsOfService.limitationOfLiabilityDesc: To the fullest extent permitted by law, our restaurant shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from:
TermsOfService.limitationOfLiabilityAccess: Your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Services
TermsOfService.limitationOfLiabilityConduct: Any conduct or content of any third party on the Services
TermsOfService.limitationOfLiabilityContent: Any content obtained from the Services
TermsOfService.limitationOfLiabilityUnauthorized: Unauthorized access, use or alteration of your transmissions or content
TermsOfService.modificationsToServicesDesc: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue our Services at any time without notice. We shall not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension, or discontinuance of the Services.
TermsOfService.governingLawDesc: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
TermsOfService.changesToTermsDesc: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.
TermsOfService.contactUsDesc: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
